ygData.subject: Re: FW: [eqenchanters] Skill Max??
ygData.msgSnippet: You are not maxed in Trade skills. They can go as high as you can afford. Combat skills are a slightly different equation. It changes by class, I don t
ygData.messageBody:
You are not maxed in Trade skills. They can go as high as you can afford.

Combat skills are a slightly different equation. It changes by class, I
don't remember it.


At 01:58 PM 4/22/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>
>
>
>In all skills, as far as I know, you are maxed by your level. The formula is
>this: max = 5+level*5.
>if your max is 65, you're probably level 12.
>Skara
>-----Original Message-----
>From: lgivens@... [mailto:lgivens@...]
>Sent: Thursday, April 22, 1999 1:24 PM
>To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqenchanters] Skill Max??
>
>
>From: lgivens@...
>
>Does anyone know how to get past the max. skill other than, 1)train at guild
>(told I am maxed), or
> 2)through use (used sense direction and other skills 100+ times and no
>gain)?
>
>Does this mean I am stuck with a skill of 65??
>
>thanks in advance,
>
>Enyen, Enchanter 4th Circle.
